definition: many/much/often/a lot of/numerous/more/in excess/how (to what extent)/multi-/Taiwan pr. [duo2] when it means "how"
(of sth) to move/to set in movement/to displace/to touch/to make use of/to stir (emotions)/to alter/abbr. for 動詞|动词[dong4 ci2], verb

pinyin: zhu4 yi4 li4 que1 xian4 duo1 dong4 zheng4

sentences.english: ADHD is like a slide projector.
To the non-ADHD partner, the interruptions are disrespectful.
sentences.chinese: 對於沒有患多動症的一方，打斷就意味着不尊重。

sentences.english: Children with attention deficit hyperactivity disorder exhibit a range of symptoms.
sentences.chinese: 患有多動症的兒童會表現出一系列的症狀。

sentences.english: I was actually self- medicating the anxiety from my ADHD with cocaine.
sentences.chinese: 我是真的自我藥物治療的焦慮從我多動症與可卡因。

sentences.english: There are holistic and traditional remedies that focus on ADHD.
sentences.chinese: 有整體的傳統的補救方法來針對多動症。

sentences.english: Brain scans and EEGs (Electro-encephalograms or brain wave tracings) are not helpful in working out whether a person has ADHD.
sentences.chinese: 腦掃描和腦電圖對多動症確診沒有幫助。

sentences.english: The study involved 43 children, 11 with ADHD and 32 controls.
sentences.chinese: 這項研究涉及43個兒童，多動症11和32的控制。

sentences.english: Does he have Attention-deficit hyperactivity disorder? Or is he simply badly-behaved?
sentences.chinese: 他是得了多動症，還是僅僅是表現不好？

sentences.english: What is Attention Deficit Hyperactivity Disorder?
sentences.chinese: 什麼是注意缺陷多動症？

sentences.english: The higher the GHA, the greater the hyperactivity.
sentences.chinese: GHA分值越高，多動症就越多。

sentences.english: The team also examined the use of medications in kids with ADHD.
sentences.chinese: 該小組還驗證了對多動症兒童使用藥物的效果。

definition: rich person's ailment (needing expensive treatment and long recuperation)
please excuse me for not complying/to politely decline

pinyin: bo2 qi3 gong1 neng2 zhang4 ai4
